title: Computer Science
description: Study of computation, information processing, and the design of computer systems and applications.
tagline: Build the future with code and innovation.
overview: Computer Science is the study of algorithms, data structures, programming languages, and the theoretical foundations of computing. Students learn to design, develop, and analyze software systems and computational solutions to complex problems.

steps: Take advanced math courses (calculus, algebra)
Learn basic programming concepts
Participate in coding competitions
Build personal programming projects
Earn Bachelor's degree in Computer Science
Complete internships at tech companies
Build portfolio of software projects
Learn multiple programming languages
Take courses in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering
Start as junior software developer
Gain experience with industry tools and practices
Specialize in a domain (web, mobile, systems)
Obtain relevant certifications
Consider Master's degree for specialization
Pursue senior developer or architect roles
Mentor junior developers
Stay current with emerging technologies

topCareers.title: Software Engineer
topCareers.description: Develops software applications and systems.

topCareers.title: Data Scientist
topCareers.description: Analyzes complex data to drive business decisions.

topCareers.title: Web Developer
topCareers.description: Builds and maintains websites and web applications.

title: Mechanical Engineering
description: Design and development of mechanical systems, machines, and thermal devices.
tagline: Designs and builds machines and systems.
overview: Mechanical Engineering involves the design, analysis, manufacturing, and maintenance of mechanical systems. Students learn to apply principles of physics, mathematics, and materials science to solve engineering problems.
requiredCompetencies: Understanding of thermodynamics and fluid mechanics

steps: Focus on math (calculus, algebra) and physics
Take engineering or robotics courses if available
Participate in science fairs or engineering competitions
Build projects with mechanical components
Earn a Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering
Complete internships in engineering firms
Join engineering societies (ASME)
Develop CAD and simulation skills
Complete capstone design projects
Obtain EIT (Engineer in Training) certification
Work under licensed Professional Engineers
Gain experience in your chosen specialization
Consider pursuing PE (Professional Engineer) license
Consider Master's degree for specialization
Obtain Professional Engineer (PE) license
Pursue leadership roles or management positions
Stay current with emerging technologies (3D printing, robotics)

topCareers.title: Mechanical Engineer
topCareers.description: Designs and builds machines and systems.

topCareers.title: Aerospace Engineer
topCareers.description: Designs aircraft, spacecraft, and related systems.

topCareers.title: Robotics Engineer
topCareers.description: Designs and builds robotic systems.

title: Data Science
description: Interdisciplinary field that uses scientific methods to extract insights from data.
overview: Data Science combines statistics, computer science, and domain expertise to analyze and interpret complex data. Students learn to collect, process, and analyze large datasets to make data-driven decisions.
requiredCompetencies: Understanding of databases and data warehousing

steps: Focus on mathematics and statistics
Learn basic programming concepts
Take advanced math courses (calculus, statistics)
Participate in data analysis projects
Earn a Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
Complete internships in data-focused roles
Learn programming languages (Python, R)
Take courses in machine learning and statistics
Build projects analyzing real-world datasets
Start as a data analyst or junior data scientist
Gain experience with different data tools and platforms
Develop expertise in specific domains
Obtain relevant certifications (AWS, Google Cloud, etc.)
Consider Master's or PhD for advanced roles
Pursue senior or lead data scientist positions
Specialize in areas like deep learning or NLP
Stay current with latest ML/AI research and tools

topCareers.title: Data Scientist
topCareers.description: Analyzes complex data to drive business decisions.

topCareers.title: Data Analyst
topCareers.description: Interprets data to help organizations make decisions.

topCareers.title: Machine Learning Engineer
topCareers.description: Designs and implements machine learning systems.

title: Biomedical Engineering
description: Application of engineering principles to medicine and biology.
overview: Biomedical Engineering combines engineering principles with medical and biological sciences to design and create equipment, devices, computer systems, and software used in healthcare.
requiredCompetencies: Strong foundation in biology and chemistry
Knowledge of medical devices and systems
Understanding of human anatomy and physiology

steps: Focus on biology, chemistry, and physics
Take advanced math courses
Participate in science fairs or research projects
Explore healthcare and engineering interests
Earn a Bachelor's degree in Biomedical Engineering
Complete internships in medical device companies or hospitals
Take courses in biology, chemistry, and engineering
Participate in research projects
Learn medical device design principles
Start as a biomedical engineer or research assistant
Gain experience in medical device development
Learn regulatory requirements
Obtain relevant certifications
Consider Master's or PhD for research roles
Pursue senior engineering or management positions
Specialize in areas like prosthetics, imaging, or diagnostics
Stay current with medical technology advances

topCareers.title: Biomedical Engineer
topCareers.description: Designs medical equipment and devices.

topCareers.description: Develops and tests medical devices.

topCareers.title: Clinical Engineer
topCareers.description: Manages medical equipment in healthcare settings.

title: Nursing
description: Healthcare profession focused on patient care and health promotion.
overview: Nursing is a healthcare profession that focuses on caring for individuals, families, and communities to help them attain, maintain, or recover optimal health and quality of life.
requiredCompetencies: Knowledge of human anatomy and physiology

steps: Focus on biology, chemistry, and health sciences
Take psychology and human development courses
Volunteer in healthcare settings
Develop strong communication skills
Earn a Bachelor's degree in Nursing (BSN)
Complete clinical rotations
Pass NCLEX-RN licensing exam
Gain experience in various healthcare settings
Join nursing organizations
Start as a registered nurse (RN)
Gain experience in different specialties
Obtain certifications in specialty areas
Consider pursuing advanced practice roles
Consider Master's degree for Nurse Practitioner or other advanced roles
Pursue specialty certifications
Take on leadership or management roles
Stay current with healthcare best practices

topCareers.description: Provides direct patient care and coordinates treatment.

topCareers.title: Nurse Manager
topCareers.description: Oversees nursing staff and patient care operations.

title: Environmental Science
description: Interdisciplinary study of environmental systems and solutions.
overview: Environmental Science is an interdisciplinary field that integrates physical, biological, and information sciences to study the environment and solve environmental problems.
requiredCompetencies: Knowledge of environmental regulations and policies
Field research and data collection abilities
Understanding of chemistry, biology, and earth sciences
Proficiency in data analysis and GIS software

steps: Focus on science courses (biology, chemistry, earth science)
Take environmental science courses if available
Participate in environmental clubs or activities
Volunteer for environmental conservation projects
Earn a Bachelor's degree in Environmental Science or related field
Complete internships with environmental organizations
Take courses in ecology, chemistry, and geology
Gain field research experience
Learn GIS and data analysis tools
Start as an environmental technician or assistant
Gain experience in specific environmental areas
Obtain relevant certifications if needed
Develop expertise in environmental regulations
Consider Master's degree for advanced roles
Pursue senior scientist or consultant positions
Obtain professional certifications
Stay current with environmental research and regulations

topCareers.description: Studies and protects the environment.

title: Finance
description: Study of money management, investments, and financial planning.
overview: Finance is the study of how individuals, businesses, and organizations manage money, make investments, and plan for the future. It encompasses areas like corporate finance, investments, banking, and financial planning.
requiredCompetencies: Understanding of financial markets and instruments
Proficiency in financial analysis and modeling

steps: Focus on mathematics and economics
Take business or accounting courses if available
Learn about financial markets and investing
Develop analytical thinking skills
Earn a Bachelor's degree in Finance, Economics, or Business
Complete internships in finance roles
Take courses in financial analysis, investments, and accounting
Learn financial modeling and analysis tools
Join finance clubs or organizations
Start as a financial analyst or associate
Gain experience in specific finance areas
Obtain relevant certifications (CFA, CPA, etc.)
Develop expertise in financial analysis
Pursue CFA (Chartered Financial Analyst) designation
Consider MBA for senior roles
Pursue senior analyst or portfolio manager positions
Stay current with financial regulations and market trends

topCareers.description: Analyzes financial data and market trends.

topCareers.title: Investment Banker

topCareers.description: Helps individuals plan for financial goals.

title: Project Management
description: Planning, organizing, and managing resources to achieve specific goals.
tagline: Leads teams to successful project delivery.
overview: Project Management involves planning, executing, and closing projects while managing resources, timelines, and stakeholders. It's applicable across all industries and requires strong organizational and leadership skills.
requiredCompetencies: Understanding of project management methodologies (Agile, Scrum, Waterfall)

steps: Develop leadership and organizational skills
Take business or management courses if available
Participate in team projects and activities
Practice time management and planning
Earn a Bachelor's degree in Business, Management, or related field
Complete internships in project management roles
Learn project management methodologies
Take courses in leadership and organizational behavior
Obtain PMP or CAPM certification preparation
Start as a project coordinator or assistant
Gain experience managing small projects
Obtain PMP (Project Management Professional) certification
Develop expertise in specific industries or methodologies
Pursue senior project manager or program manager roles
Consider MBA for executive positions
Mentor junior project managers
Stay current with project management best practices and tools

topCareers.title: Project Manager
topCareers.description: Oversees projects from conception to completion.

topCareers.description: Manages multiple related projects.
